Now I'd like to extend this to some directories I currently store in Google Drive, which I want to move away from.Can I somehow add a new directory to Syncthing and share it with all devices that already share a different directory?Adding new folders to sync to devices always feels like such a UX struggle.Any suggestions are appreciated.
